author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Coimbatore Fashion Fest is organising an event on eco-friendly theme of ‘Go Green’ on Sunday.

The fest will include a fashion show ‘Mr & Mrs Coimbatore’ comprising 10 fashion designers, and 20 models. Manoj Saravanan, Coimbatore Fashion Fest founder, said that, “This time, the models and designers are Coimbatore-based and have been individually trained by professionals to put them in front of the audience.”

Aim

Their main idea is to bring out the city’s cultural heritage using both western and ethnic costumes.

The main emphasise of the event is on raising funds for the orphanage in Peelamedu and also promoting use of organic cotton fabric.

The fest would be held at Hotel Vijay Elanza at 5 p.m. and the chief guests for the event will be producer Shubh Malhotra, director Thirumurugan and model Komal Kalra.
title: ‘Go Green’ fashion fest on Sunday
